name: Tracks to Union Avenue Vol.1
description:
Limited Edition CD of the Debut EP from Doug Perkins and The Spectaculars.  

This disk features 5 tracks and is presented in the style of a 1950's Vinyl single.  The disk is even textured to feel like vinyl!  Presented in a slip case just like a record with sleeve notes printed on the back.  

Pressed from a glass master instead of burned by a laser this product is of superior quality equal to that of a commercially available CD

Track Listing

1. Just like a Child
2. Work in Your Own Time
3. Love is Blind
4. Full Time Rockin' Man
5. Heaven is a Night with You

All tracks written and performed by Doug Perkins and The Spectaculars

All tracks copyright control.
